transcript:
Customer: Tere naam ki
Executive: Hello
Customer: Sir aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Lead manager mein gaya main.
Customer: Haan lead mobile se open kiya na aapne?
Customer: Nahi PC se abhi.
Executive: Achha PC se kiya hai to lead manager pe upar search bar ke bagal ek filter ka option bana hai na?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan us pe click kariye.
Customer: Achha ab uske baad kya page open hua hai aapka quick filters wala ya uske bagal filters wala?
Customer: Location source date requirement date status.
Executive: To yahan pe aap us pe location source source mein direct ko select kariye. Location ke niche source haan aur niche se apply kariye.
Customer: Apply.
Executive: Haan to ab dekhiye aapki jo kuch chats aayi hai wo direct inquiries hai ye wo inquiries hai jo customer samne se aapke paas aaye hue hain. To lead
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Direct means kya sir website pe?
Executive: Main batati hu. Haan main batati hu direct ka matlab yahan pe hota hai ek hoti hai by lead matlab customer jaise just in case main ek buyer hu mujhe ye product chahiye maine Google pe search kiya ya maine apni requirement dali to maine sirf aise check kiya hai to wo lead ho gayi us lead pe wo buyer ko char se panch log call karte hain aur inquiry ka matlab hai buyer aapki profile pe aaya hai usne aapke is is specific products ke liye aapko message kiya hai. Thik hai? To buyer particular aapko hi message kar raha hai ya call kar raha hai to wo hamara direct source hai. Aap samajh rahe hain by leads pe hum sirf by lead pe aapke alawa aur char log baat karenge lekin inquiry jo directly aati hai wo customer aapke is dekhiye aapke hi product aur aapke hi profile ke through aapke paas aaya hai. Usko nahi pata hai ki matlab by lead pe nahi pata hota ki isko kaun panch log call karenge but yahan pe wo specifically aapko connect kar raha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai? Ye ye difference hai. To rate of conversion bhi leads direct inquiries aur calls pe zyada hota hai kyunki customers ne already aapke ek profile pe aa chuke hain product dekh chuke hain price dekh chuke hain unhone aapka catalog visit kiya hai aap samajh rahe hain?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To yahan ke inquiries pe kuch aisi unread dikh rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Unread unread yaani kuch pending required jo padi ho. Haan to aap un ji aap unko revert kariye na sir tabhi to maine aapko direct inquiry ka filter yahan se bataya. Lead manager pe hamara sara data dikhta hai but agar hume unhe calls pe by leads aur inquiries pe filter karna hai to uske options bhi hain. Aap aise laga ke check kar sakte hain.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ab in inquiry ko bhi aap revert kariye inse baat kariye sir dekhiye ek din mein aur ek call pe online conversion possible nahi hai na. Aapki jo machinery hai aapke jisme dealing hai aapko bhi pata hai same day matlab maybe hota hoga but online mein thoda customer bhi to apna pura check karega hi na sir. Aap mujhse kal sir ne bola tha ki mera customer agar wo panch logo se baat kar raha hai to wo pancho se rate lega. To ye cheez aapke product line mein hai hi right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aap ek bar is tarike se bhi check kariye by leads ka main wo by leads pe dekhiye buyer ka mindset koi nahi judge kar sakta hai chahe koi offline aapki shop par hai chahe koi bhi buyer hum verify
Customer: Apna jo maximizer hai jo pack. Haan haan. Usme kya kya mila hai humko uska mere ko detail bhejna.
Executive: Achha main uski detail aapko bhejna hai aapko bhejna hai ya main bata bhi deti hu maximizer jo hoti hai wo hamari website services hoti hai yaani aapka own domain se run hota hai aapka jaymabhavaniopset.com ye aapka domain name hai jo aapne IndiaMART se banwaya hai thik hai? Aapka sub domain nahi aapka apna domain hai iske credentials aapko mile hi honge iski char mail IDs aapko provide ki gayi hongi hamare through is pe aapko jo by leads milti hai wo total 44 yaani hafte ki 30 aur din ki do daily bonus milti hai plus iske alawa jo aapka domain hai is pe searches zyada hote hain matlab aapka jo hai wo profile visible zyada hota hai customer ko direct customer aapki website pe land karta hai by the traffic of IndiaMART so aapka domain aapka hai profile aapka hai lekin jis pe traffic hai wo IndiaMART ke through aa raha hai. Thik hai? To ye sari cheeze is pe hoti hai. To fir main iske kya kya benefits hai website services ke wo main aapko bhej dungi.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Haan ji to sir aap bataiye abhi matlab isko hume kya karna hai aapko abhi kya aur issue aa raha hai dekhiye by leads ka main aapko clearly hi bol rahi hu buyer ka mindset koi nahi judge kar sakta aapki bhi shop pe koi offline buyer aaya hai.
Customer: Verification bhi dekhiye usme.
Customer: Haan ji?
Customer: Verification ka bhi dekhiye.
Executive: Main very dekhiye very verify bilkul dekhiye agar hum verify waise hoti hai leads ab buyer to hume bol dega hi na agar wo check bhi wo sirf inquiry ke liye hi kar raha hai agar usne hume bol diya for example ki nahi meri requirement hai but aapke call karne pe usne rate lene ke baad mana kar diya usne kisi aur se rate leke man lijiye humne verify kiya usne bola meri requirement hai jab tak aap use call kar rahe hain us beech mein usko do teen buyer ne aur call kar liya supplier ne aur usne use bata diya.
Customer: Pehle call pe aisa ho gaya to uska bhi kya hai?
Executive: Pehle call pe aisa hoga.
Customer: Haan 20 minutes ago means aisa hi tha na wo.
Executive: 20 minute pehle 21 minute pehle na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Nahi sir 21 minute pehle main aapko waise bhi bata sakti hu ek minute ke andar ek minute chhodiye seconds ke andar bhi leads sold out hoti hai leads sold out hone ka matlab panch log baat kar rahe hain. To aap to 20 minute baad ki baat kar rahe hain na log yahan pe ek minute ke andar bhi leads sold out hoti hai. To 20 minute mein to char log ya panch log ya main kehti hu dusre bhi agar aap ho gaye just in case aapke product line ke according main bolti hu customer ka sir koi range koi nahi laga sakta buyer pe kuch nahi ho sakta hai ki hum wo hume bol raha hai hai requirement kyunki usko rate lena hai ya usko koi apna hi business chalu karna hai ya dekhna hai humse bolega ki hum hum to aapko bolenge humne verify kiya but buyer agar deny kar dega to aap bhi kuch nahi kar payenge hum bhi kuch nahi kar payenge aur buyer to kuch karega hi nahi. Tabhi to main aapko inquiries aur calls ka bhi bata rahi hu na ki tabhi to hum aapko dekhiye number of leads aapke sath hai aapko daily do bonus milti hai aapko 44 leads mil rahi hai iska matlab ye hum so pehle agar aap kafi purane hain aap dekh sakte hain pehle lead ka number itna hum itni leads nahi provide karte the kyunki pehle ke market mein ab ke market mein bahut antar hai ab competition bhi bahut badh gaya hai log rate lene ke liye bhi aate hain jate hain aapko bhi pata hai. Tabhi to inquiries bhi aapko di jati hai calls bhi di jati hai teeno pe alag customer bhi hote hain to aap unko check karna proper follow up aap wo cheeze bhi hume properly check karni padegi na sir. Aur plus aapka catalog usme kafi cheeze jo hai wo missing hai like details wagera kafi kam mentioned hai aapka jo catalog ka score hai wo 68% ka hai jo hume at least 80% karna hota hai matlab zyada se zyada details rakhni hoti hai apni profile mein ek photo aur price aur do char basic details se nahi chalta jitni zyada is product ka information add hota hai utni zyada us product ki visibility aati hai then aapko call aur inquiry aayegi. Maine aapse ratings ki bhi baat ki thi kal ki rating bhi kam hai usko bhi hum increase karenge tabhi bhi hamari calls aur inquiries pe effect aayega. Aap samajh rahe hain? Hmm hmm. To ye sari cheeze hume is tarike se karni padegi na sir. Hum ek kam karte hain na sir dekhiye abhi to mere kuch system ka glitch aa raha hai pata nahi video meet maine khud aapse bola tha but ye schedule hi nahi ho pa rahi hai meeting ki main join kar pau. Ye jaise hi schedule hogi main aapko jo hai jaise hi technical glitch mera khatam ho jayega abhi check ho raha hai internally to hum isko wapas se schedule karenge aur baat karenge is pe tab tak main aapka ye concern close kar deti hu aap bataiye jaisa aap kahe kyunki maine aapko bola leads ka sir same hai agar aap isko open bhi rakhte hain to leads ka issue aap kisi se bhi baat karenge to wahi aayega ki buyer ka koi range nahi hai aapko call kar sakte hain aapko inquiry dal sakte hain kyunki aap pure national platform pe hai na sir. Koi kisi ko rok to nahi sakta ki hume call mat karo ya hum agar aapka number aapki profile ya visible hai to log karenge hai na ab koi aapke shop hmm ab koi agar aapke shop pe bhi aa raha hai usko nahi lena hoga to aap thodi na bolenge chale jao. Hamara account manager kaun hai abhi is waqt? Sir main hi hu riya baat kar rahi hu main maine hi aapko call kiya tha meri hi aapse baat ho rahi hai. Haan ji? Aapke upar kaun hai aapke isme? Mere manager mere manager shalu mam hai fir actually wo leave pe chal rahi hai unki tabiyat nahi thik hai fir hamare manager naveen sir hai aapko unse baat karni hai to aap bata sakte hain main unse aapki baat kara dungi. Hmm thik hai agli bar jab wo aapka aa jaye na ticket to main close nahi karwa raha wahi karwayenge thik hai sir jo hai. Kaun karayega sir matlab? Jo malik hai yahan ke. Gopal sir. Haan ji. To sir unse main unhe call karke bolu matlab wo to abhi apne pe hi staff the matlab unse meri utni baat hui fir kal sham aap meri aapse baat hui abhi bhi maine aapko call kiya kyunki humne 12 baje ka time diya tha but sorry for the delay. To abhi aap bataiye sir haan ji. Machine mein bhi kuch kar rahe hain to abhi to nahi pick up karenge. Main 3 baje ke baad call kar lu sir unhe sir? Aap 6 baje call kar le. 6 baje? Hmm. Sir 6 baje tak mera bhi office ka time over ho jata hai na. 5 baje matlab 5 ya 5:30 tak kar dena 5:30. 5 baje main ek bar 5 baje ke baad unko call karke dekh lungi maybe wo free honge to wo mujhe jaisa hoga bata dungi us time pe right? Thik hai. Thik hai sir thik hai. Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants details of maximizer pack.

- Customer wants to talk to the owner.



Resolution:

- Executive explained direct inquiries vs buyleads.

- Executive offered to send maximizer pack details.

- Executive agreed to call the owner at 5 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the owner at 5 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, maximizer, website services
